tool.name: Generate genotype population
tool.help:
**What it does**
Accepts a file that contains Affymetrix identifiers and a subset of the user specimen identifiers and regions for genotyping. The corals (stag) database is queried to retrieve the user specimen identifiers and regions that are missing for each Affymetrix identifier, and a complete set of genotype population information is produced for use as input to the Corals Multilocus Genotype tool. This tool must be able to access the stag database.
